actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to clarify the treatment of certain non-controlling developers or providers of distributed ledger services involved in digital assets with respect to money transmission laws, and for other purposes.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the treatment of certain non-controlling developers or providers of distributed ledger services involved in digital assets with respect to money transmission laws, and for other purposes.

A bill to clarify the treatment of certain non-controlling developers or providers of distributed ledger services involved in digital assets with respect to money transmission laws, and for other purposes.
